notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Percent change is calculated on unrounded data. Institute totals exclude non-R&D components of institute budgets.
sources: Agencies' submissions to OMB per MAX Schedule C, agencies' budget justification documents, and supplemental data obtained from agencies' budget offices.
